message: I sat down and leaned back into the sofa, exhausted.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Seriously, though. Think before you start picking fights. You're gonna give me a heart attack."
My tone is joking, but I mean what I say.
I'm scared that if I don't say something, he really will get hurt one day.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anyway, we need to focus on Toue, start looking for some―"

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't get you."
Noiz interrupts me.

name: ノイズ
message: "What's the point?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Of what?"

name: ノイズ
message: "This."
Noiz lifts his bandaged hand.

name: ノイズ
message: "What do you get out of it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? What do I get?"

name: ノイズ
message: "...Oh, right."
Noiz sneers.

name: ノイズ
message: "Having me around makes your life easier. I'm useful, right?"
What the hell is he talking about? If anyone doesn't understand what's going on, it's me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Do you even hear the words coming out of your mouth?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Normal people don't do this sort of thing without a motive."
Noiz waves his injured hand back and forth.

name: ノイズ
message: "Helping strangers? It's inefficient. There's nothing to gain."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So you think I only treated your wound because I want something from you?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Am I wrong?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Dead wrong."
Something stirs in the pit of my stomach.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you talking about? There's plenty of reasons to help someone... like, just because your worried about them or something."

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't buy it. Not for a second. ...Oh. I get it."
Noiz suddenly flings off his hat and stands, facing me.
Is he gonna hit me? I start to rise, but then―
Noiz does the last thing I expected.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Is this what you're after?"
No!<K> No! No! No!
What?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell?! What's wrong with you?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Nothing."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why the hell would you kiss me?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "If you're not trying to use me, then you must be after this."

name: 蒼葉
message: "This?! This what?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?!"
Holy shit. He's serious. Dead fucking serious.
How in the hell did he come to that conclusion?!
While I'm still struggling to make sense of this, Noiz leans in one again.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, hold up, you crazy teenager! Wait!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Shut up."
He pulls my head toward him, silencing me with his lips.
I try to push him away with both hands, but he grabs my chin and forces my lips open.
His tongue pushes inside my mouth... and a gentle tingle of pleasure runs down my back. I can't help it.
Noiz's tongue squirms about, caressing the insides of my cheeks and trying to catch my tongue.
Shit... This is kinda...
Every time Noiz's tongue moves in my mouth, I feel something clack against my teeth.
What...?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hngh... Ngh...!"
But before I can even start to worry about that, I feel something happening in my pants.
Fuck...
He isn't even that good of a kisser... but it's been so long, I'm just kinda...
...Why am I so defenseless?

name: ノイズ
message: "...Getting hard?"
Noiz pulls his tongue out of my mouth and deliberately grinds his knee into my crotch.
Mortifying though it is, he has gotten a bit of a rise out of me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, it's not my fault! You just started... doing stuff!"

name: ノイズ
message: "But it's because I kissed you, right?"

name: ノイズ
message: "What're you gonna do? Rub one out by yourself?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh, what do you expect?! I'm only human! It's natural!"

name: ノイズ
message: "I'll help."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "And you can return the favor."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, no, no, no! Just stop right there! This is completely nuts!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Nuts how?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You do me, I do you... Who does that?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Listen."
Noiz lets out a frustrated sigh.

name: ノイズ
message: "Why you freaking out? We're both guys; so what? Plus, like you said, it's natural."

name: ノイズ
message: "We'll just be giving each other some relief. I mean, it's more efficient that way, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No! Absolutely not! No way!"
How the hell is that more efficient?!
What is even going on? Is this some new age shit?
Is this how far the morals of our youth have deteriorated?
But he's not really that much younger than me...
He's just insane! That's the only thing that makes sense!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Anyway. I respectfully decline your offer, so please let me g―hey!"
Noiz suddenly tugs on my arm.
Unable to pull free, I stand and follow behind him.
He's dragging me... to his room. Of course.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! Woah!"
